title: C is a versatile, efficient programming language used for system development, embedded systems, and applications across various domains.
Introduction to Algorithms
description: An algorithm is a step-by-step procedure or set of rules for solving problems, performing tasks, or making decisions in computer science.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Learn object-oriented programming, data structures, and algorithms using C++ for efficient problem-solving and software development.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Fundamental components in computer science, including arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues, used to organize and manage data.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Explore object-oriented programming concepts, classes, inheritance, and polymorphism for building modular, reusable, and efficient Python applications.

title: Software Engineering
description: The systematic design, development, and maintenance of software solutions, using principles, processes, and tools to meet user needs effectively.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Amazon Web Services offers scalable, on-demand cloud resources, enabling businesses to deploy, manage, and scale applications efficiently.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: MySQL is a popular open-source relational database management system, known for its speed, reliability, and ease of use in web applications.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Applying logical thinking and coding skills to solve complex problems efficiently through algorithmic and creative approaches.
